targets.rawSql:
SELECT  squad, 
        max(avaSlo) as 'ava slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(ava_debt ,0)),0) as 'ava debt',
        max(expSlo) as 'exp slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(exp_debt ,0)),0) as 'exp debt',
        max(latSlo) as 'lat slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(lat_debt ,0)),0) as 'lat debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE $__timeFilter(start) 
Group by squad

SELECT  feature, 
        max(avaSlo) as 'ava slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(ava_debt ,0)),0) as 'ava debt',
        max(expSlo) as 'exp slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(exp_debt ,0)),0) as 'exp debt',
        max(latSlo) as 'lat slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(lat_debt ,0)),0) as 'lat debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE 
$__timeFilter(start)  and squad = '$squad'
Group by feature

SELECT
  ifnull(avg(nullif(ava_debt,0)),0)  as 'debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and squad = '$squad'

SELECT
  ifnull(avg(nullif(exp_debt,0)),0)  as 'debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and squad = '$squad'

SELECT
  ifnull(avg(nullif(lat_debt,0)),0)  as 'debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and squad = '$squad'

SELECT
  feature, 
  avg(ava_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and squad = '$squad'
group by feature

SELECT
  feature, 
  avg(exp_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and squad = '$squad'
group by feature

SELECT
  feature, 
  avg(lat_debt) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and squad = '$squad'
group by feature

SELECT  feature, 
        max(avaSlo) as 'ava slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(ava_debt ,0)),0) as 'ava debt',
        max(expSlo) as 'exp slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(exp_debt ,0)),0) as 'exp debt',
        max(latSlo) as 'lat slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(lat_debt ,0)),0) as 'lat debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
$__timeFilter(start)  and squad='$squad'
Group by feature

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  feature,
  avg(nullif(ava_debt, 0)) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and squad = '$squad'
group by start, feature

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  feature,
  avg(nullif(exp_debt, 0)) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and squad = '$squad'
group by start, feature

SELECT
  start AS "time",
  feature,
  avg(nullif(lat_debt, 0)) as 'debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start) and squad = '$squad'
group by start, feature

SELECT  feature,  source,
        max(avaSlo) as 'ava slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(ava_debt ,0)),0) as 'ava debt',
        max(expSlo) as 'exp slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(exp_debt ,0)),0) as 'exp debt',
        max(latSlo) as 'lat slo',
        ifnull(AVG(NULLIF(lat_debt ,0)),0) as 'lat debt'
FROM HourlySquad
WHERE 
$__timeFilter(start)  and squad = '$squad'
Group by feature, source

SELECT  M.name, M.email
FROM Squads S join SquadMembers SM on S.id = SM.squadId join Members M on SM.memberId = M.id
WHERE squad = '$squad'
